definition: (med.) endothelium/thin skin on the inside of some fruits (e.g. oranges)

sentences.english: Objective To study the effects of hand transmitted vibration on plasma concentrations of vascular endothelial substance.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨手传振动对血管内皮活性物质的影响及意义。

sentences.english: By the 6th month, the subendothelial layer could be distinguished.
sentences.chinese: 内皮下层第6个月可辨认出来。

sentences.english: The capillary endothelium and the astrocytic sheath form the blood-brain barrier.
sentences.chinese: 毛细血管内皮和星形细胞鞘一起构成血脑屏障。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the anti-adhesion effects of heparin on endothelial cells.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨肝素对内皮细胞黏附功能的影响。

sentences.english: Wall thickening ofCasparian strip is evident in its endodermis.
sentences.chinese: 茎有内皮层，凯氏带加厚明显。

sentences.english: The expression of eNOSis related to the formation of tumor blood vessels.
sentences.chinese: 内皮型的表达与肿瘤血管的形成有关。

sentences.english: An experimental study on the inhibiting effect of Shenmai Injection on endothelial cell proliferation.
sentences.chinese: 参麦注射液对牛内皮细胞增殖抑制作用的实验研究。

sentences.english: Rapid re-endothelialization of implanted coronary artery stent is a new way for preventing restenosis.
sentences.chinese: 表面快速内皮化是预防支架植入后再狭窄的新途径。

sentences.english: The endodermis had clear Casparian strips on its cells.
sentences.chinese: 其内皮层细胞上凯氏带明显。

sentences.english: The capillaries were found lined by thick non-fenestrated endothelial cells.
sentences.chinese: 松果体毛细血管衬以厚的无窗孔内皮细胞。

sentences.english: ICA could significantly inhibit the hypoxia induced apoptosis of VECs.
sentences.chinese: ICA能显著抑制缺氧诱导的内皮细胞凋亡。

sentences.english: Treatment for infantile hemangioendothelioma depends on the child's growth and development.
sentences.chinese: 治疗小儿血管内皮取决于孩子的成长和发展。

sentences.english: These nodes represent an integral part of both the immunologic and reticuloendothelial systems.
sentences.chinese: 这些淋巴结是免疫系统和内皮系统主要部分。

sentences.english: Vascular endothelial growth factor can induce the formation of subretinal neovascularization.
sentences.chinese: 血管内皮生长因子可诱导视网膜下新生血管的形成。

sentences.english: Pathological examination showed that in treatment group, vascular endothelial cell injury was significantly less than that of the resuscitation group.
sentences.chinese: 病理显示，治疗组血管内皮细胞损害明显轻于复苏组。

sentences.english: IGF-1 mRNA expression in endothelial cells were found in 5 cases of middle-late stage.
sentences.chinese: 中晚期组织有5例毛细血管内皮细胞表达阳性。

definition: serosa/serous membrane (smooth moist delicate membranes lining body cavities)

pinyin: dong4 mai4 zhou1 yang4 ying4 hua4

definition: choroid (vascular layer of the eyeball between the retina and the sclera)
